trait.name: Hatred
text: Deprived of parental bonds, the unhatched despise those who nurture and heal others. The unhatched has advantage on attacks against a creature whose most recent action was to heal, restore, strengthen, or otherwise aid another creature.

trait.name: Minor Magic Resistance (3/Day)
text: As a bonus action, the unhatched gives itself advantage on its next saving throw against spells or other magical effects.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
text: The unhatched's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring only verbal components:
At will: chill touch, minor illusion

action.name: Multiattack
text: The unhatched makes one bite attack and one claw attack.

action.name: Claw
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (3d6 + 2) slashing damage.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) necrotic damage.

action.name: Desiccating Breath (Recharge 5-6)
text: The dragon exhales a cloud of choking dust infused with necrotic magic in a 30-foot cone.

Each creature in the area must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 16 (3d10) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature who fails this save can't speak until the end of its next turn as it chokes on the dust.
